article.name: Is it possible to check the login / operation history of the web console?
article.title: Is it possible to check the login / operation history of the web console?
article.body:
• Mackerel does not currently have a feature that lets you view the login / operation history of the web console.
  • However, it is possible to receive notifications for the following items as an auxiliary function in select notification channels.
    • Host status changes
    • Host registration / retirement
    • Monitor operations (only for monitors configured from the web console)
  • Mackerel also provides the following features as security measures.
    • Enable 2-step authentication or another authentication method for access via the web console.
      • Using 2-step authentication - Mackerel Help
      • Mandatory 2-Step Authentication - Mackerel Help
    • Register IP restrictions in white list format to access the web console and API.
      • This can be set from Organization> Settings> IP Restrictions.
